signature=invoiceFooter.querySelector(".signature");if(signature){signature.style.display="block";signature.style.textAlign="right";signature.style.width="50%";}}const invoiceSummary=invoiceClone.querySelector(".invoice-summary");if(invoiceSummary){invoiceSummary.style.display="block";invoiceSummary.style.textAlign="right";invoiceSummary.style.marginTop="10px";invoiceSummary.style.marginBottom="20px";}const
